name: Fools Match
description:
Fools Match is a new fun HTML5 Match-3 game designed by us. This is a Casual Puzzle game with special graphics. We have designed attractive characters for this game including funny fool faces that you should match.

This game has a different gameplay in comparison with our previous Match-3 games

 In this game, 3 same color fool faces on the bottom of the Puzzle Board should be chosen and come to the top to disappear. But you should be careful to choose the correct order of colors and do not lose.

This Match-3 game has a level generator and it can produce infinite levels, so you will have no problem with your users who want to play this game endlessly.

You can read more information about this game on our website:

https://doondook.studio/product/fools-match-html5-match3-game/

Comment your ideas and share them with us! Or you can share your ideas via email: doondookstudio@gmail.com
